name: Crispy Crunchy Chicken
steps: ['Mix butter, garlic powder and seasoning.', 'Dip chicken in mixture.', 'Coat chicken in cornflakes.', 'Bake at 350F for 45 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']
description: A perfect family favorite for a crispy dinner.

name: Steamed Salmon with Asparagus
steps: ['Steam asparagus for 5 minutes.', 'Season salmon with salt and pepper.', 'Steam salmon for 10 minutes.', 'Serve with a lemon wedge.']
description: Quick and healthy meal for a busy weeknight.
